attributes.action: Immediately cut prison funding by at least 50%.
attributes.additional_details: There is, again, evidence that inmates in our prisons are having a really good time, while those people on the outside who are paying for it are suffering exponential increases in their cost of living.  This immoral situation cannot be allowed to obtain and funding to prisons should be cut by at east 50% to ease the pressure on the innocent and unconvicted taxpayer.
